subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After nine seasons as a shortstop and third baseman with the Marlins and the Dodgers, Hanley Ramirez has returned to the Red Sox as a left fielder.
snippet: After nine seasons as a shortstop and third baseman with the Marlins and the Dodgers, Hanley Ramirez has returned to the Red Sox as a left fielder.
